item.title: Meta与三家公司达成核电协议
item.description: Meta Platforms周五宣布，已与美国中部的三家Vistra核电站签订为期20年的购电协议，并与两家计划建造小型模块化反应堆的公司达成合作协议。【原文：Meta Platforms said on Friday it struck 20-year agreements to buy power from three Vistra nuclear plants in the U.S. heartland and develop projects with two companies hoping to build small modular reactors.】

item.title: 摩根大通并购业务全球主管艾扬格表示，风险上升将推动并购交易激增
item.description: 摩根大通全球咨询与并购业务主管阿努·艾扬格在接受路透社采访时表示，随着首席执行官们寻求规模带来的安全感以应对日益加剧的经济和地缘政治风险，2026年交易撮合者将迎来又一个辉煌年份，目前在建项目数量创下历史新高。【原文：Dealmakers are set for another banner year in 2026 with a record number of deals in the pipeline, as CEOs seek out the safety of scale to weather mounting economic and geopolitical risks, JPMorgan's Global Head of Advisory and M&A, Anu Aiyengar, told Reuters in an interview.】

item.title: 白宫召集石油巨头、贸易商和钻井商商讨委内瑞拉问题
item.description: 白宫官员称，白宫将于周五召集美国及国际主要石油公司召开会议，商讨对委内瑞拉能源领域的潜在投资。当前美国政府正寻求重振这个受制裁国家原油产量的途径。【原文：The White House is convening a meeting on Friday with major U.S. and international oil companies to discuss potential investment in Venezuela’s energy sector, as the administration weighs ways to revive crude output in the sanctions-hit country, according to a White House official.】

item.title: 华尔街本周展望：财报季开启，通胀数据考验韧性十足的美股
item.description: 美国股市以强劲态势开启2026年，但随着企业财报季拉开帷幕、通胀数据出炉以及地缘政治不确定性加剧，未来数日或将面临震荡。【原文：U.S. stocks have kicked off 2026 on a strong note, but could face turbulence in the coming days with the start of corporate earnings season, fresh inflation data and rising geopolitical uncertainty.】

item.title: 焦点：英伟达与汽车供应商携手合作，重启自动驾驶推进计划
item.description: 自动驾驶汽车行业短暂的发展历程中，充斥着代价高昂的失败和无休止的延误，但科技供应商、英伟达等芯片制造商以及部分汽车制造商正押注人工智能和合作伙伴网络，以期推动新的进展。【原文：The short history of the self-driving car industry has been littered with expensive failures and endless delays, but tech suppliers, chipmakers including Nvidia and some automakers are betting on AI and a web of partnerships to spark new progress.】

item.title: 威盛电子就恩智浦半导体资产被扣押一事向荷兰政府提起国际仲裁
item.description: 据两位熟悉法律程序的消息人士向路透社透露，中国翼泰公司正寻求国际仲裁，要求荷兰政府就扣押芯片制造商恩智浦一事赔偿高达80亿美元。【原文：China's Wingtech is seeking international arbitration in pursuit of up to $8 billion in damages following the Netherlands' seizure of chipmaker Nexperia, two sources familiar with the legal proceedings told Reuters.】

item.title: 嘉能可股价上涨，因与力拓合并有望形成全球最大矿业公司
item.description: 格伦科尔公司股价周五上涨近10%，此前有消息称该公司正与力拓集团就潜在收购事宜进行谈判，该交易将缔造全球最大的矿业集团，估值近2070亿美元。【原文：Glencore shares rose by almost 10% on Friday following news it is in talks with Rio Tinto , about a potential takeover that would create the world's largest mining group, valued at almost $207 billion.】

item.title: 财新网报道，恩智浦半导体中国母公司旺达科技表示正在遴选本土晶圆供应商。
item.description: 荷兰恩智浦半导体（Nexperia）的中国子公司正在遴选本土企业供应硅晶圆，并扩大国内封装产能。恩智浦的中国母公司应力科技向财经杂志《财新》透露了这一消息。【原文：The Chinese unit of Netherlands-based Nexperia is selecting local firms to supply it with silicon wafers and is expanding domestic packaging capacity, Nexperia's Chinese owner Wingtech Technology told financial magazine Caixin.】

item.title: 宝马第四季度销量下滑，因中美市场需求疲软
item.description: 德国汽车制造商宝马周五报告称，受美国和中国需求疲软拖累，2025年第四季度销量出现下滑。【原文：German carmaker BMW on Friday reported declining sales in the final quarter of 2025, dragged by weaker demand in the United States and China.】

item.title: 联合国粮农组织称12月全球食品价格回落 但2025年仍将上涨
item.description: 联合国粮食及农业组织周五表示，全球食品价格12月连续第四个月下跌，主要受乳制品、肉类和植物油价格下行拖累，创下自2025年1月以来的最低平均水平。【原文：World food prices declined for a fourth consecutive month in December, mostly pressured by dairy, meat and vegetable oil prices, marking the lowest average since January 2025, the United Nations' Food and Agriculture Organization said on Friday.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称贝恩资本收购Manappuram交易因印度监管担忧而推迟
item.description: 知情人士透露，由于美国贝恩资本公司已在另一家印度金融机构持有控股权，印度央行已对该公司收购Manappuram Finance控股权的计划提出异议。【原文：India's central bank has raised objections to Bain Capital's plan to acquire a controlling stake in Manappuram Finance as the U.S. firm has a controlling interest in another Indian lender, three people with direct knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 日本加强对外国投资的监管不太可能阻断并购热潮
item.description: 日本拟赋予当局权力，可要求外国投资者追溯性撤资，此举旨在保护大型企业和供应链，但专家认为这不太可能抑制日益增长的并购兴趣。【原文：Japan's plan to give authorities the power to order foreign investors to retroactively divest acquisitions is aimed at sheltering major firms and supply chains, though it is unlikely to curtail increased M&A interest, experts say.】

item.title: 中国汽车销量增速创三年新低，出口表现强劲
item.description: 2025年中国汽车销量增速放缓至三年最低水平，而中国制造汽车的出口量则超出预期。汽车制造商正加速海外扩张，以抵消国内市场疲软的影响。【原文：China's car sales in 2025 slowed to their weakest pace in three years while exports of made-in-China cars beat estimates, as automakers stepped up overseas expansion to offset a sluggish domestic market.】

item.title: 迪士尼首席执行官会见中国高层官员，"米老鼠之家"在美中紧张关系中寻求突破
item.description: 中国一名高级官员周五在北京会见了迪士尼首席执行官鲍勃·艾格，据官方媒体报道，在中美紧张关系持续之际，这家"米老鼠公司"正寻求加强其在世界第二大经济体中的立足点。【原文：One of China's top officials met with Disney CEO Bob Iger in Beijing on Friday, state media reported, as the "House of Mouse" seeks to strengthen its foothold in the world's second-largest economy amid fraught U.S.-China tensions.】

item.title: 卢特尼克称，因莫迪未致电特朗普，印美贸易协议陷入停滞
item.description: 美国商务部长霍华德·卢特尼克周五表示，印度与美国之间的贸易协定之所以推迟，是因为总理纳伦德拉·莫迪未能致电总统唐纳德·特朗普敲定双方正在谈判的协议。【原文：India's trade pact with the United States was delayed because Prime Minister Narendra Modi did not make a telephone call to President Donald Trump to close a deal they were negotiating, Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick said on Friday.】

item.title: 萨克斯百货困境笼罩羊绒之王库奇内利的百货店投资
item.description: 意大利奢侈品牌布鲁内罗·库奇内利以售价3000美元的羊绒衫闻名，曾大力押注百货商店。如今，随着美国标志性高街零售商萨克斯百货陷入偿债困境，这一战略正受到密切关注。【原文：Italian luxury brand Brunello Cucinelli , known for its $3,000 cashmere sweaters, bet big on department stores, a strategy now in the spotlight as iconic U.S. High Street retailer Saks struggles to pay back debts.】

item.title: 马斯克旗下xAI公司将在密西西比州数据中心投资逾200亿美元
item.description: 密西西比州州长泰特·里夫斯周四在声明中表示，埃隆·马斯克的人工智能初创公司xAI将投资逾200亿美元在南阿文市建设数据中心。生成式人工智能的蓬勃发展正推动着对更高计算能力的需求。【原文：Elon Musk's artificial intelligence startup xAI is investing more than $20 billion to build a data center in Southaven, Mississippi, state Governor Tate Reeves said in a statement on Thursday, as a boom in generative AI fuels demand for increased computing power.】

item.title: 台积电第四季度营收达1.04608万亿新台币，超出预期
item.description: 根据路透社基于台积电公布的月度数据进行的计算，全球最大代工芯片制造商台积电周五报告称，其第四季度营收为10460.8亿新台币（合330.5亿美元）。【原文：TSMC , the world's largest contract chipmaker, reported on Friday fourth-quarter revenue of T$1,046.08 billion ($33.05 billion), according to Reuters calculations based on monthly data the company released.】

item.title: 晨间竞价：非农就业数据与关税政策双重打击？
item.description: 安库尔·班纳吉带您展望欧洲及全球市场今日走势【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Ankur Banerjee】

item.title: 中国汽车制造商小鹏汽车在激烈竞争中力推人工智能转型
item.description: 中国汽车制造商小鹏汽车表示，希望以"实体人工智能"公司的身份获得更广泛的认知，而非仅被视为汽车制造商。该公司正筹备在今年晚些时候启动无人驾驶出租车的道路测试，并开始批量生产类人机器人。【原文：Chinese automaker Xpeng said it wanted to become better known as a “physical AI” company rather than just a carmaker, as it gears up to launch street trials of robotaxis and start mass producing humanoid robots later this year.】

item.title: 韩国将开放24小时外汇市场，力争MSCI升级
item.description: 韩国财政部周五表示，该国将于7月起开放外汇市场实施24小时交易，进一步放宽境内交易限制，以争取获得发达市场地位的升级。【原文：South Korea said on Friday it will open up its currency market to allow 24-hour trading starting in July, further removing restrictions on onshore trading in a bid to win an upgrade to developed-market status, the finance ministry said.】

item.title: 预计12月美国就业增长放缓；失业率可能有所下降
item.description: 美国12月就业增长可能放缓，因企业受进口关税影响对招聘持谨慎态度，且人工智能投资持续攀升。不过，失业率预计将降至4.5%，这可能支撑市场预期美联储本月将维持利率不变。【原文：U.S. job growth likely slowed in December amid business caution about hiring because of import tariffs and rising artificial intelligence investment, though an anticipated easing in the unemployment rate to 4.5% could support expectations the Federal Reserve will leave interest rates unchanged this month.】

item.title: 缔造全球巨头的矿业巨额交易
item.description: 力拓集团与嘉能可公司表示，双方正就收购事宜进行初步磋商，此举可能缔造全球最大的矿业巨头，合并市值将近2070亿美元。【原文：Rio Tinto , is in early talks to buy Glencore , the companies said, in what could create the world's largest mining company with a combined market value of nearly $207 billion.】

item.title: 市场对力拓与嘉能可收购谈判的反应
item.description: 力拓集团与嘉能可公司表示，双方正就收购事宜进行初步磋商。若交易达成，将缔造全球最大矿业巨头，合并市值将近2070亿美元。【原文：Rio Tinto is in early talks to buy Glencore , the companies said, in what could create the world's largest mining company with a combined market value of nearly $207 billion.】

item.title: 亚洲股市小幅回落，美元走强，就业报告与关税裁决前夕
item.description: 亚洲股市周五小幅走低，美元坚挺，市场正等待关键就业报告出炉。与此同时，投资者正为最高法院对特朗普总统去年引发市场震荡的全球性关税合法性裁决做准备。【原文：Asian stocks drifted lower and the dollar stood tall on Friday ahead of a crucial jobs report, while investors girded for a Supreme Court ruling on the legality of President Donald Trump's sweeping global tariff that jolted markets last year.】

item.title: Aktis Oncology将美国IPO发行价定为每股18美元
item.description: 抗癌药物开发商Aktis Oncology周四宣布，其扩大的美国首次公开募股定价为每股18美元，筹集资金约3.18亿美元。【原文：Cancer drug developer Aktis Oncology said on Thursday it priced its upsized U.S. initial public offering at $18 per share, raising about $318 million.】

item.title: 油价上涨，因市场对委内瑞拉和伊朗供应中断的担忧加剧
item.description: 周五油价连续第二日上涨，有望实现连续第三周上涨，这源于委内瑞拉未来供应前景的不确定性，以及伊朗局势动荡加剧了市场对其产量的担忧。【原文：Oil prices rose for a second day on Friday, set for their third weekly gain, on uncertainty about the future of supply from Venezuela and as Iranian unrest increases concerns about output there.】

item.title: 强生公司与美国政府达成协议以降低药品价格
item.description: 强生公司周四表示，已与美国总统特朗普政府达成协议，将为美国民众降低药品价格，以换取美国关税豁免。【原文：Johnson & Johnson said on Thursday that it has reached an agreement with U.S. President Donald Trump's administration to cut drug prices for Americans in exchange for exemptions from U.S. tariffs.】

item.title: 中国消费者物价涨幅逼近三年高位，生产者物价通缩压力缓解
item.description: 中国12月消费者价格年同比涨幅升至34个月高点，主要受食品价格上涨推动，但全年涨幅跌至16年来最低水平，同时生产者价格持续通缩，表明需求疲软态势仍在延续。【原文：China's annual consumer price inflation accelerated to a 34-month high in December, driven by rising food prices, but the full-year rate slumped to the lowest in 16 years while producer deflation persisted, indicating persistent softness in demand.】

item.title: 中国人工智能公司MiniMax香港上市首日股价有望大幅上涨
item.description: 中国人工智能模型开发商MiniMax集团将于周五在香港市场首次公开募股，此前该公司已筹集48.2亿港元（约合6.186亿美元），延续了香港科技股上市热潮。【原文：Chinese artificial intelligence model developer MiniMax Group is set to jump on its Hong Kong market debut on Friday after raising HK$4.82 billion ($618.6 million), extending a flurry of tech listings in the city.】
